channel.title: Whistler on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Whistler on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Whistler Municipality - The Natural Step Framework - PART 1
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4W9JjszYaRw Uploaded on Oct 25, 2007 This case study features interviews with Whistler’s municipal decision makers about the decision making process used to evaluate a new Natural Gas pipeline and the long-term energy needs of the community using the Natural Step Framework, and working with Terasen Gas to evaluate options. Community consultation, co-operation, and partnerships resulted in a successful process. The 2010 Olympics allowed the pipeline to be built at the same time as the road from Vancouver to Whistler.
